text: 59|23|tanallate yatearu aradhyanumillattavanaya allahuvanavan. rajadhikaramullavanum paramaparisud'dhanum samadhanam nalkunnavanum abhayam nalkunnavanum melneattam vahikkunnavanum pratapiyum paramadhikariyum mahatvamullavanum akunnu avan. avar pankucerkkunnatil ninnellam allahu etrayea parisud'dhan
